verses.text: \w After|strong="H7200"\w* \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Babylon \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w carried|strong="H1540"\w* \w away|strong="H1540"\w* \w Jeconiah|strong="H3204"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoiakim|strong="H3079"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* well \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w craftsmen|strong="H2796"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* metalsmiths \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Babylon, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w baskets|strong="H1736"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w* placed \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w front|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w One|strong="H3808"\w* \w basket|strong="H1731"\w* \w had|strong="H1731"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* those \w that|strong="H7451"\w* ripen early, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* other \w basket|strong="H1731"\w* contained \w very|strong="H3966"\w* poor \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* could \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten.

“\w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*,” \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*, “\w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*?” “\w Figs|strong="H8384"\w*!” \w I|strong="H7200"\w* replied. “\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1961"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1697"\w*,

“\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: ‘\w Like|strong="H3651"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w regard|strong="H4480"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w exiles|strong="H1546"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, whom \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w land|strong="H4725"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* keep \w My|strong="H7760"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w build|strong="H1129"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H1129"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tear|strong="H2040"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w*; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w uproot|strong="H5428"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w* \w figs|strong="H8384"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w bad|strong="H7451"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* eaten,’ \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, ‘\w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* deal \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*—\w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w remaining|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* \w living|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w horror|strong="H2113"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* offense \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w disgrace|strong="H2781"\w* \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w object|strong="H2113"\w* \w of|strong="H4725"\w* \w scorn|strong="H2781"\w*, \w ridicule|strong="H4912"\w*, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w cursing|strong="H7045"\w* \w wherever|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w banished|strong="H5080"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w plague|strong="H1698"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w perished|strong="H8552"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* fathers.’”
